div.p: I’d like to go for promotion, I’ve been a Wholetime Fire Fighter now for nearly 10 years, raising up to the next level would mean a lot to me
and I’d also be one of the first black Fire Fighters to be able to do that in the County for the one I work in so yeah it would mean a lot
even just for my progress I mean I never like to stay stagnant anyway I always want to do better, it’s like with my DJ-ing
you know you start one place and you always want to rise don’t you? So being a Fire Fighter is the same thing. I’ve gone for it once before
2 years ago, didn’t get through but you can’t let it knock you back you just try again.
